data.agents
Class AgentCollectionStorageMySQL

java.lang.Object
  data.agents.AgentCollectionStorage
      data.agents.AgentCollectionStorageMySQL

public class AgentCollectionStorageMySQL
extends AgentCollectionStorage

AgentCollectionStorageMySQL handles the storage of agents using a MySQL database.

Author:
W.H. Mook
